item.description:
"I can't believe I haven't been here yet."

If that's what you're saying to yourself, then now's the time to change that. A really popular and favorite spot among locals (and some of our own craft beer crewmates), this bar - really, it's more of a beer mecca - is sure to please. Just look at the selection of beer they offer. Somebody, wipe the drool from chin, please...


http://www.cambridgec...

So, let's gather for laughs (hence the BrewHaHa) at a very uncommon - and much-appreciated - place in Beantown. Hope to see you there. Cheers!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one drinking beer. Oh wait...
item.name: An Uncommon BrewHaHa at Cambridge Common
